title: Overview of Vietnam's Economic History during Doi Moi (since 1986)
summary: The lecture summarizes the economic development process of Vietnam since the beginning of Doi Moi in 1986. Content includes the context before Doi Moi with a planned economy, major development stages, and key milestones. The initial phase (1986-1990) focused on removing subsidies and attracting foreign investment. The 1991-2000 period recorded strong growth, normalization of international relations, and agricultural development. The period from 2001 to present emphasizes deep economic integration, with WTO accession and the rise of the private sector.
key_topics: Normalization of relations with US and joining ASEAN
